definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to imbue with/to inculcate/to instill into/to teach/to impart/to channel water to another place
to irrigate/to pour water into/to inject water into meat to increase its weight (plumping)/to cook the books/to post low-value messages (small talk etc) on Internet forums
to pour into/perfusion (med.)/to concentrate one's attention on/to teach/to inculcate/to instill
to flow backwards (of water, because of flood, tide, wind etc)/reverse flow/to back up (sewage)
grouting/(of grain) to be in the milk/to form a vesicle (medicine)
drip irrigation/to irrigate by drip feed
to fuddle/to befuddle/to inebriate/to get someone drunk

sentences.english: That they were graven with an iron pen and lead in the rock for ever!
sentences.chinese: 用铁笔镌刻，用铅灌在磐石上，直存到永远。

sentences.english: He looked like he was some slob having a beer at a baseball game. Embarrassing.
sentences.chinese: 看起来就像个棒球赛里灌着啤酒邋邋遢遢的笨蛋。

sentences.english: There is no cavitation damage and irrigation water and so on.
sentences.chinese: 不存在汽蚀破坏及灌引水等问题。

sentences.english: You turn bright red after drinking two tablespoons of beer.
sentences.chinese: 你在猛灌两大勺啤酒后面色变的红润光鲜。

sentences.english: Effect of different irrigation on spring crop more than autumn crop.
sentences.chinese: 不同灌水量对春茬番茄影响比秋茬大。

sentences.english: Two men are locked in a dark room standing knee high in gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 两个人被锁在灌有及膝高汽油的暗室里。

sentences.english: Pork irrigation soup packets , Carrots eggs bag, millet congee.
sentences.chinese: 猪肉灌汤包，胡萝卜鸡蛋包，小米粥。

sentences.english: I'11 give you an enema tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我今天晚上要给你灌一次肠。

sentences.english: He got full of gin and laid round Wright's poolroom all day.
sentences.chinese: 他灌了一肚子杜松子酒，在赖特台球室躺了一天。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the best method of detecting acid-fast bacilli in bronchial perfusate.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨捡测支气管灌洗液中抗酸杆菌的最佳方法。

sentences.english: The experimental group was treated with coptis chinensis compound while the control group was only perfused with sterile water.
sentences.chinese: 实验组灌喂复方黄连，对照组裸鼠仅灌喂无菌水。

sentences.english: The experimental group was treated with coptis chinensis compound while the control group was only perfused with sterile water.
sentences.chinese: 实验组灌喂复方黄连，对照组裸鼠仅灌喂无菌水。

sentences.english: Traveller is a key equipment for the cantilevercasting.
sentences.chinese: 挂篮是悬灌施工的关键设备。

sentences.english: The stimulation effect of alternative furrow irrigation was obvious in the appropriate level of irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 交替隔沟灌溉在适宜的灌水量水平下，产量增加显著。

sentences.english: He drove the idea in somehow, and hoped that his staff would retain it.
sentences.chinese: 他总算把这个概念硬灌了进去，并希望员工们记住它。

sentences.english: Gulping cups of colourful alcohol, we get drunk.
sentences.chinese: 我们，把数不清的七彩酒精灌下肚，醉了。

definition: big mouthful (of food, drink, smoke etc)/open mouth/gulping/gobbling/gaping
to drain the cup in one gulp (idiom)
to unscrew/to twist off (a lid)/to turn on (a faucet)/to switch on (by turning a knob)/to turn (a door handle)/to wrench apart
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
to irrigate/to pour water into/to inject water into meat to increase its weight (plumping)/to cook the books/to post low-value messages (small talk etc) on Internet forums
